document_data.name: Ataman al-Hajar
document_data.mainbody: '''Ataman al-Hajar''' was a [[noble dao]] who lived deep within an intricate cave system on the island of [[Al-Zira]] in the [[Djinni's Claws]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: Ataman was short for a noble dao, but still possessed a truly massive frame.
document_data.Personality: Like most noble dao, Ataman al-Hajar was an irritable [[genie]] who found it difficult to be polite to those who were beneath him.
document_data.Activities: He directed a force of [[xorn]] and [[earth elemental]]s beneath the mountains of Al-Zira, collecting gems, precious ore, and other treasures.
